20110127130936.000|20110127130938.000|TR0|hour with this system.  So, a number of

20110127130940.000|20110127130942.000|TR0|of folks, this wasn't just confined to one 
20110127130942.000|20110127130945.000|TR0|area, from D.C. through Delaware, up to 
20110127130945.000|20110127130947.000|TR0|Baltimore and Philadelphia, up through

20110127130949.000|20110127130951.000|TR0|everybody getting a piece of this.

20110127130955.000|20110127130957.000|TR0|freezing mark, not drastically cold air 
20110127130957.000|20110127131000.000|TR0|behind this.  And for the most part, it's 
20110127131000.000|20110127131002.000|TR0|been a pretty high water content event.  
20110127131002.000|20110127131004.000|TR0|Meaning, the snow has been very pretty wet

20110127135731.000|20110127135733.000|TR0|
20110127135733.000|20110127135735.000|TR0|DANIEL WERWATH, MIX SANTA FE:  You know,

20110127135737.000|20110127135740.000|TR0|probably -- you know every summer I see 
20110127135740.000|20110127135742.000|TR0|around a dozen friends move on for jobs or

20110127135744.000|20110127135746.000|TR0|places like New York or Portland, Oregon 
20110127135746.000|20110127135748.000|TR0|or places like that.
20110127135748.000|20110127135750.000|TR0|
20110127135750.000|20110127135752.000|TR0|FOREMAN:  And that's where Mix comes in.  
20110127135752.000|20110127135755.000|TR0|These are the founding members and this is 
20110127135755.000|20110127135757.000|TR0|Mix, part pre-forum social club, part 
20110127135757.000|20110127135759.000|TR0|business networking group, part town hall 
20110127135759.000|20110127135801.000|TR0|meeting.  Mix is a once a month party in 
20110127135801.000|20110127135803.000|TR0|which young people are urged to meet, have 
20110127135803.000|20110127135805.000|TR0|fun and share ideas about what they want 
20110127135805.000|20110127135808.000|TR0|their community to be.     LACIE MACKEY,
